text:
Since the Depend task now stores the dependency information in a file (rather 
than a directory), it is not possible to specify the name of the file.

Suggest deprecating the cache parameter and introducing a new parameter 
cacheFile, which specifies the name of the file to use to store dependencies.
creator: oliver@puppycrawl.com
holtdl@yahoo.com
text: I don't see the need for this. If no one else does, either, let's close it out.
No need to Oliver, sorry, obviouslly it's not that important :)
